Add email address(es)

POST /user/emails

Input

You can post a single email address or an array of addresses:

[
  "octocat@github.com",
  "support@github.com"
]

Response

Status: 201 Created

[
  {
    "email": "octocat@github.com",
    "primary": false,
    "verified": false
  },
  {
    "email": "support@github.com",
    "primary": false,
    "verified": false
  }
]
